alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 3:46PM CDT until June 10 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Western Newton County in east central Mississippi... Northeastern Smith County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 346 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Steele to 6 miles southwest of Lake to near Pineville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Steele around 350 PM CDT. Lake around 355 PM CDT. Conehatta, Lawrence and Roberts around 410 PM CDT. Prospect around 415 PM CDT. Louin around 420 PM CDT. Montrose and Garlandville around 425 PM CDT. Newton, Union, Decatur and Stratton around 430 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
